September 20, 2023 - If you run a business that sells perishable goods, it is only natural to want to get your products on this platform. Sadly, it is a lot more difficult than when selling through the standard Amazon marketplace. The reason: since 2018, third-party sellers have been stopped from enlisting to sell through the Amazon Fresh platform. The theory is that after the 2017 acquisition of Whole Foods, Amazon decided to close off the Fresh program to third-party sellers, instead focusing on the brands ...
